EXCLUSION_LIST_DESC: The files with the above extensions will not be used for compression.
FILE_SPLIT_CHUNCK_SIZE_MB_DESC: Chunk size when the file is split into smaller pieces.
MAX_SAME_FILETYPE_IN_DIR_DESC: If a folder has more than 200 files of same type in a directory, it will be compressed irrespective of the directory size.
7ZIP_LOCATION_WINDOWS_DESC: Complete path of the 7zip executable file. 7zip can be downloaded here: https://www.7-zip.org/
7ZIP_LOCATION_LINUX_DESC: Complete path of the 7zip executable file. 7zip can be installed using sudo: apt-get install p7zip-full
